interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: ZZLOVE Amino Acids Body Wash for Men Women Moisturizing Shower Gel with Milk Protein Hydrolysate and Natural Plant Extracts Review Date: 2021/09/14 Store: ZZLOVE Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'ZZLOVE', 'Scent': 'Honey, Papaya', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.77 x 3.03 x 2.95 inches; 14.39 Ounces'} Review Text: *I noticed the company removed Bath and Body Works (they might've meant bath and body wash, typos happen). Much better, so I'll bump my rating up to 3.5, or round up to 4.
__

I like the scent, and it works well as a body wash. I think the price is a bit high for the smaller bottle, but the amino acids may be worth it for you (for cleansing, volume, shine, etc). I'm rating it 3 stars, since I got a really nice body wash a while ago that was priced similarly but was in a pump bottle twice this size, and made in USA. So you may have to shop around a bit.

I'm also unclear why it mentions Bath and Body Works, since it doesn't seem to be associated with them? A bit bait and switchy, but probably innocent.

Came well packed with a stopper on the pump to prevent leakage and a sturdy cardboard box. Review Title: Nice light scent, foams/rinses well.* Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Pine Gel Nail Polish Set Chameleon Shimmering Color and Black 7.5 ml LED UV Cured Soak Off Nail Gel for Nail Art Manicure pine {'Brand': 'Pine', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '4.96 x 3.7 x 2.91 inches; 9.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '738628890993'} These are fun colors. I love that each bottle has the color at the top of the cap. So often it's hard to find the color you're looking for. I got a couple of sets from this company, and they're all quality. Love the colors, and that each bottle has the color on the top of the cap. Gel Nail Polish Set, Glitter 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Anzuo {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Number of Pieces': '6', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 3.15 x 3.54 inches; 10.23 Ounces'} These are fun colors; I'd say more New Years Eve party than Xmas. I like that it comes with stickers to mark the top of the caps, but I wish each bottle had the color at the top of the cap already, since it can take some time for the polish to dry. I guess you could write it down? So often it's hard to find the color you're looking for. I got a couple of sets from this company, and they're all quality. Love the colors, more New Years Eve party than Xmas. Would have preferred color already on cap. Organic Sweet Almond Oil and Fractionated Coconut Oil Bundle for Hair and Skin, 100% Pure and Natural, Hexane-Free, Moisturizing, For Healthy Skin, Silky Hair, Multiuse Body Oil, 16 fl. Oz X 2 Shiny Leaf {'Brand': 'Shiny Leaf', 'Scent': 'Almond Oil and Fractionated Coconut', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '32.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '8.62 x 5.04 x 2.48 inches; 2.23 Pounds', 'UPC': '781584950669'} As another reviewer said, in much better detail so I'll keep my review brief, the coconut oil being refined does nothing for skincare. I assume the other is in the same boat, despite being unrefined. Which is a shame, since that is what I got them for. Oh well, partly my fault I guess for not reading the fine print. Wish I'd seen "refined" before selecting. 8 PCS 40ML Mini Spray Bottles, FANDAMEI Fine Mist Plastic Spray Bottles, Empty Refillable Clear Atomizer for Cleaning, Travel, Essential Oils, Perfume, Makeup Liquids. Travel Size, Pink & Blue Fandamei {'Brand': 'Fandamei', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '40 Milliliters', 'Number of Items': '8', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '8.46 x 5.79 x 1.42 inches; 5.93 Ounces'} Excellent travel size, sturdy enough to withstand travel. Good price. The two colors make it a little easier for organization. Sturdy, compact spray bottles. Heyedrate Activated Charcoal Soap Bar and Face Wash | Organic, Vegan, Natural Soap made with Dead Sea Mud and Our Essential Oil Blend (1 Pack (5 Ounces)) Eye Love {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Eye Love', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus, Coconut, Grapefruit, Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural, Vegan', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 1 x 1 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '850436007827'} I like the ingredients, not super in love with the scent, but it's faint and doesn't linger, so no problem really. This worked up a good lather, not the best, but better than others with a washcloth; the lather didn't disappear either so I didn't need to keep going back to the soap. It's a nice size, larger than others I've tried, and seems like it will last at least a week, probably longer. Non-daily use it could last much longer. As far as moisturizing, I can at least say it didn't dry me out, which is a plus. Faint scent doesn't linger, good lather. Scrunchie Holder Stands with 8 Pack Large Size Scrunchies - Acrylic Hair Ties Organizer for Teenage Girls and VSCO Girls Gift Stuff Beeager {'Color': 'Yellow,Gray,White', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Beeager', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Package Dimensions': '10.55 x 3.98 x 3.7 inches; 10.86 Ounces'} A scrunchy stand is a great idea. The company went the extra distance here to include a nice assortment of scrunchies to go with it. Would make a great gift for someone. Comes in a nice cardboard box. Nice variety, giftable. Boho Wide Headband with Button, Stretchy Elastic Ear Saver Knotted Headwear Sport Athletic Yoga Gym Head Wrap Hair Accessories for Women,Youth(Type D) Heybe {'Material': 'Cloth', 'Fabric Type': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'Heybe', 'Item Form': 'Wrap', 'Unit Count': '3.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '11.02 x 7.87 x 0.59 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '782500152327'} These are nice quality and variety, and the buttons hopefully will hold up and help out aching ears. But these aren't really giftable. I got these for someone who was complaining about ear aches from wearing masks all day, and they looked at them and went, "huh?" No directions, no picture of someone wearing them, just a plastic packet with the words "headbands with buttons". I shouldn't have to explain this. Just a picture of someone wearing these included in the packaging would be perfect, but don't be surprised if you get these as a gift for someone and find they're not using the buttons for their intended purpose. Good variety, but no directions. ZZLOVE Amino Acids Body Wash for Men Women Moisturizing Shower Gel with Milk Protein Hydrolysate and Natural Plant Extracts ZZLOVE {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'ZZLOVE', 'Scent': 'Honey, Papaya', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.77 x 3.03 x 2.95 inches; 14.39 Ounces'} *I noticed the company removed Bath and Body Works (they might've meant bath and body wash, typos happen). Much better, so I'll bump my rating up to 3.5, or round up to 4.
__

I like the scent, and it works well as a body wash. I think the price is a bit high for the smaller bottle, but the amino acids may be worth it for you (for cleansing, volume, shine, etc). I'm rating it 3 stars, since I got a really nice body wash a while ago that was priced similarly but was in a pump bottle twice this size, and made in USA. So you may have to shop around a bit.

I'm also unclear why it mentions Bath and Body Works, since it doesn't seem to be associated with them? A bit bait and switchy, but probably innocent.

Came well packed with a stopper on the pump to prevent leakage and a sturdy cardboard box. Nice light scent, foams/rinses well.*
profile:
**User Preference Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: The user continues to favor gel nail polish sets with vibrant colors for special occasions while exploring hair and skin products. Their recent purchase of a moisturizing body wash demonstrates an interest in effective cleansing products, alongside their existing exploration of functional accessories that cater to specific lifestyle needs.

- **Aesthetic Values**: The user emphasizes practicality and effective design in beauty items, valuing thoughtful details and usability. Their recent interaction with body wash highlights their trend towards choosing products with a pleasant scent and good cleansing properties, which enhance daily routines while maintaining aesthetic appeal.

- **Quality Awareness**: The user prioritizes high-quality products, as seen in their careful assessment of the body wash's features and price. Though satisfied with the scent and performance, they express concerns about pricing and packaging, reinforcing their need for clarity and superior presentation in product offerings.

- **Conscious Choices**: The user remains committed to non-toxic, cruelty-free, and organic options, integrating ethical considerations into their selections and reinforcing their dedication to responsible consumerism while evaluating product efficacy.

- **Engagement Style**: Loyal to trusted brands, the user carefully reviews product specifications and feedback. Their recent review reflects a focus on usability and packaging, balancing quality and ethical values alongside a discerning approach to pricing.

Overall, the user is actively seeking practical, aesthetically pleasing, and ethically responsible beauty products while considering effective and enjoyable personal care items.
